item.description:
3/23 (sat) - 11:30am to 12:30pm TALK: Disaster Management, at 299 Hancock St. (It's a restaurant right next to the gallery/tax service)

 

First 20 people to show up will receive an "Emergency Preparedness Radio" (Retail: $46.98) by Red Cross. Built-in flashlight, USB cell phone charger and crank/solar-powered. (http://safetycentral.com/etamredcrmif1.html?utm_source=googlepepla&utm_medium=adwords&id=18283950120&utm_content=pla)



Sign up: http://tsunami-hancock309.eventbrite.com

Please signup using above link.

 

The TALK consists of:

- The power point presentation "Emergency Preparedness" designed by the Office of Emergency Management, City of Boston.

- The "Disaster Management" DVD made by Sendai Broadcasting, Miyagi, Japan.
item.name: Tsunami Orphan Benefit: TALK: Disaster Management
